name: OCKEntityQuery
desc: A protocol that customizes and sorts query results for non-ephemeral entities.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new query with default properties.

items.name: init(OCKEntityQuery)
items.desc: Creates a new query from any other entity query, and copies properties common to both queries.

items.name: init(dateInterval: DateInterval)
items.desc: Creates a new query with a specific date interval.

items.name: init(for: Date)
items.desc: Creates a query that spans the entire day on a specific date.

items.name: init(id: String)
items.desc: Creates a query to retrieve an entity with the a specific unique identifier.

items.name: var dateInterval: DateInterval?
items.desc: A date interval for entities that match the query.

items.name: var groupIdentifiers: [String]
items.desc: An array of group identifers that match the query.

items.name: var ids: [String]
items.desc: An array of unique identifiers that belong to the entities that match the query.

items.name: var limit: Int?
items.desc: The maximum number of results the query returns.

items.name: var offset: Int
items.desc: An integer value that indicates how much to offset the query results, and which can be used to paginate results.

items.name: var remoteIDs: [String]
items.desc: An array of remote IDs for entities that match the query.
